text:
When used in the context of the Catalina-based standalone-server, the Administration web-app 
doesn't use the Namespace selected by the SlideHost. This causes that the HTML interface 
displays information about the right namespace, but all actions get submitted to the default 
namespace.

Solution: Unify the context parameter/attribute names used to select the 
namespace by the tag library (StrutsTagUtils/JstlTagUtils), SlideHost, and AdminAction.
creator: cmlenz@apache.org

text:
This should be fixed in CVS, both HEAD and SLIDE_1_0.

[Fixed by unifying the name used for 
storing the namespace name in servlet-context attributes and init-parameters to 
"org.apache.slide.NamespaceName", which was being used by the Slide-Catalina-Wrapper, but not 
the Slide-Administration-Webapp... Now everything should be using the same name.]

I don't 
have the standalone-server setup, so I didn't actually test this fix yet. If there is still a 
problem, we'll reopen this bug.
creator: cmlenz@apache.org
